meanings.definition: A source of illumination that is brighter than a standard light.
meanings.sent1: The superlight in the room illuminated every corner brightly.
meanings.sent2: He installed a superlight in his garage for better visibility.
meanings.sent3: The superlight in the attic seemed to have a mind of its own, turning on and off randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a superlight, bringing warmth to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The superlight from the lighthouse guided ships safely through the night.
